activity.title: Drag and Drop Multi
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word(s) into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: The beach there is OK, but in my opinion, it’s <blank word="overrated"/> .

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: The path can be <blank word="slippery"/>   when it gets wet, so be careful.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Don’t go into the <blank word="cave"/>   without a flashlight. It’s probably very dark in there.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: The city of New Orleans is <blank word="on"/>   the Mississippi River.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: I <blank word="really like"/>   the scenery there. You don’t want to miss it.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: The valley is located <blank word="in"/>   the central part of the mountain range.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
